DOC.detailed_description: Patients divide two group : 1 ) report receive intramuscular ( IM ) influenza vaccine past 3 year ; 2 ) report receive IM influenza vaccine past 3 year . The survey response compare two group . In addition , subject report receive IM vaccine past 3 year ask compare experience IM vaccine versus ID vaccine .
